participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Emily loves exploring her artistic side through writing and Halloween decorations.
participant_1.background: I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. I love to create spooky decorations for Halloween. I need a place where I can practice my guitar without disturbing the neighbors. I'm counting down the days to retirement and enjoying my singing time in the shower.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and driven, Jordan balances his work as a software engineer with his love for storytelling and creativity.
participant_2.background: My MacBook Pro is always there for me when I need to work on my dog blog. My favorite musical is Hamilton. My dad is an airline pilot. I enjoy my work as a software engineer, but it can be stressful. I want to get married again.

content.text: Hello! I'm from a small town in the Midwest, and I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. What's your favorite musical?
Hello! My favorite musical is Hamilton. I love the music, the choreography, and the story. I'm also a big fan of Broadway musicals in general.
That's awesome! I love Hamilton too. I've seen it on Broadway twice.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm so jealous! I've only seen it on YouTube.
It's definitely worth seeing live if you ever get the chance.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer. I work from home, so I can avoid my allergens.
That's great! I work from home too. I'm a writer.
That's awesome! I love to write. I used to write a lot of short stories, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
Me too! I used to write a lot of poetry, but I haven't written anything in a long time.
Great! We can start a writing group.
That sounds like a great idea!
Awesome! I'm excited to start writing again!
